description:
Gao prepares for the final fight against Dai by reworking his deck, while Bal asks Genma Todoroki for advice on how to beat Dai`s colossal Buddy, Duel Jaeger. Tensions mount as Gao and Dai face off in the final match!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Wasshoi! Chou Higashi Odoroki Taikai Kesshou Matsuri!!
ワッショイ! 超東驚大会決勝祭り!!
